===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# centi-, 10<sup>−2</sup>
#: [[厘米]] [[centimeter]]
# a [[fraction]], a [[part]]
# abreviation of [[市厘]], a traditionnal unit of measure ( see [[w:Chinese_units_of_measurement|Chinese units of measurement]] )
# currency unit : 0.001 [[元]] or 0.1 [[分]]
# [[unit]] of monthly [[interest]] (0.01%), [[unit]] of annual [[interest]] (1%)
# Li (c. 2000 BC), sixth of the [[w:Yan_Emperor|legendary Flame Emperors]] ([[炎帝]]), also known as Ai [[哀]]
